regions.text:
Jeroen van der Laak is a member of the advisory boards of Philips, The Netherlands and ContextVision,
Sweden, and received research funding from Philips, The Netherlands, ContextVision, Sweden, and
Sectra, Sweden in the last five years. Geert Litjens is a member of the Medical Advances Advisory
Board of Vital Images (Minnetonka, USA), received research funding from Philips Digital Pathology
Solutions (Best, the Netherlands), and had a consultancy role for Novartis (Basel, Switzerland.
Francesco Ciompi is Chair of the Scientific and Medical Advisory Board of TRIBVN Healthcare, France,
and reports advisory board fees from TRIBVN Healthcare, France.
